data.title: Sonia Agarwal – Selvaraghavan Divorce ?
data.meta_description: According to the media resources,It is said that spilt between selva and sonia agarwal gets widening and with their mutual consent,the couple heading towards divorce also.Also the rumors says that sonia has been spotted in a family court. The couple worked in the films 7g rainbow colony,kadhal kondaen,pudhupettai...Then they got married with the approval of…
data.text:
According to the media resources,It is said that spilt between selva and sonia agarwal gets widening and with their mutual consent,the couple heading towards divorce also.Also the rumors says that sonia has been spotted in a family court.

The couple worked in the films 7g rainbow colony,kadhal kondaen,pudhupettai…Then they got married with the approval of the parents.
